    George MZ Xu

    Assistant Professor in Supply Chain Management

    • George MZ Xu - AI and OSCM researcher
    • Brighton, United Kingdom
    • University of Sussex Business School
    • Email
    • Google Scholar

    üòÄ about me

    I focus on developing and applying arificial intelligence models to enhance operations and supply chain management. I am currently an assistant professor at University of Sussex Business School (USBS). Also, I am an visiting research fellow at Leeds University Business School (LUBS). I obtained my PhD degree at Hong Kong Polytechnic University (HKPolyU) and completed AI course and projects at The Hong Kong University of Science and Technology (HKUST). During my master studies at Macau University of Science and Technology, I worked on projects related to supply chain relationship.

    I am particularly interested in sustainable operations management, natural language processing (NLP) and machine learning applications, healthcare operations, fashion business and supply chain, supply chain innovation, etc.

    Mingze Xu, Ivan Ka Wai Lai, Huajun Tang

    • Journal of Consumer Behaviour. 2021.
    • Methodology Feature: Survey methodology using primary data.
    • This study explores the mediating effects of relationship quality between supplier CER and BRPI.
